K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:454b-1: a'arya dva ya sa ma t'a bi dza y'a khy'a bi kalba mah'a r'a dz'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:454b-3: 'phags pa gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:454b-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:454b-5: 'di skad bdag gis thos ba dus gcig na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:454b-6: bcom ldan 'das gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:454b-7: lha'i khang bzang na ri'i rgyal bo ri rab dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i rdul phra rab gyi grangs dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:454b-8: byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas thob pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:454b-9: rdo rje'i rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba sha stag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:454b-10: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:454b-11: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:454b-12: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:454b-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:454b-14: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu tshur dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:454b-15: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mnyam pa nyid kyi sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:455a-1: sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:455a-2: de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri rab dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i rdul phra rab kyi grangs dang mnyam pa dang thabs cig go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:455a-3: de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang byin gyi rlabs kyis lha'i rgyal ba'i khang bzang de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:455a-4: nor bu rin po che'i khang brtsegs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:455a-5: nor bu rin po che chen po'i tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:455a-6: kha dog sna tshogs rnam par bkra ba'i dar dpyangs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:455a-11: rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan phreng dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:455a-15: me tog gi chun po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:455a-17: dar gyi lnga ldi rlung gis bskyod pa la sogs pa'i rgyan bkod phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:455a-18: dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor cha shas yongs su rdzogs pa bzhin du kun nas mjes par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:455a-19: ston pa bcom ldan 'das ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam tshig gi ye shes rnam pa sna tshogs pa khyad par 'phags pa dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:455a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i cod pan gyis khams gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal po dbang bskur ba brnyes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:455b-0: de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor chen po'i dbang phyug @455b yongs su rdzogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:455b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:455b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rmad du byung ba'i phrin las sna tshogs mdzad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:455b-3: thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:455b-5: thugs rdo rje mnyam pa nyid la dus gsum du rtag par bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:455b-6: sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lugs pa med pa thams cad kyi re ba yongs su skong bar mdzad cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:455b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:455b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba btab pa la bdag gir mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:455b-9: gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang thabs cig ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:455b-10: dper na til gyi gang bus dzambu'i gling yongs su gang ba bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:455b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re re las kyang gzhal du med cing grangs su ma mchis pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing snang bar gyur cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:455b-12: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad na yang gnyis su med ba mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba mchog tu gsang ba'i chos kyi sgo 'di nyid ston par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:455b-13: yang de'i tshe na lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang chen po zhes bya ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:456a-0: de bzhin gshegs la rab tu gnas @456a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:456a-1: pa; de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod pa yang dag par sgrub par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:456a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i phrin las rjes su skyong ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:456a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa po ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:456a-4: de ltar rang gi rigs kyi chos la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor rjes su 'dzin par gnas pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:456a-5: 'dus pa chen po'i dbus su rang gi lus mi snang bar mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:456a-6: de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis tshogs kyi nang na byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje mi snang bar gyur pa gzigs nas gsungs dbyangs gcig gis ched du rjod pa 'dis ched du brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:456a-7: ae ma lag na rdo rje 'chang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:456a-8: bdag cag yongs kyi byed pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:456a-9: 'dus pa'i dbus nas mi snang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:456a-10: mgon khyod da lta gang du bzhud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:456a-11: ces gsungs nas thams cad kyang so so'i mi shigs pa rdo rje rin po che mchog gi byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas su cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:456a-12: de nas lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang chen po des /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:456a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnas lnga las byung ste bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i skur bzhengs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:456b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen por snang ba de dpag tshad stong phrag gi tshad du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen por byin gyis brlabs @456b nas; de'i dbus su gnas par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:456b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus par gyur nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:456b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rje bo la gsol ba btab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:456b-3: rdo rje chos phyir khyod legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:456b-4: rdo rje'i spyan phyed khyod legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:456b-5: rdo rje ye shes phyir khyod legs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:456b-6: sangs rgyas ye shes phyir khyod legs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:456b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:456b-9: sangs rgyas kun la phan par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:456b-10: sems can mgon la gsol ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:456b-11: khyab bdag theg pa chen po'i tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:456b-12: theg pa'i mchog ni bstan du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:456b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:456b-14: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad de skad ma zer cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:456b-15: spro ba mchog gi de kho na nyid kyi tshul nges par bstan par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rab tu gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:456b-16: ci'i rgyus rdo rje 'dzin rab tu gsung /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:456b-17: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad kyis dgongs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:456b-18: de nyid kyi tshe 'khor chen po'i dkyil 'khor du byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams theg pa chen po mchog gi don gyi tshul chen po 'di thos nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:456b-19: rnam ba stong du rnam par bsnyil bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:457a-0: @457a *// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:457a-1: khyod kyis zhi bar byin brlabs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:457a-2: sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:457a-3: khyab bdag de nyid rdo rje can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:457a-4: byin rlabs mnyam par kun tu spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:457a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes spyan gdangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la legs so byin nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:457a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo chen po'i 'od zer gyis bgang nas /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:457a-8: snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po bzhi rab tu byung bar gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:457a-9: shar gyi phyogs su mi zad pa'i gzugs 'dzin ma zhes bya ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po rab tu shin tu byung bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:457a-10: lho phyogs surin po che yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po rab tu shin tu byung bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:457a-11: nub phyogs su 'chi med rdo rje zhes bya ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po rab tu shin tu byung bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:457a-12: byang phyogs su don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po rab tu shin tu byung bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:457b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba @457b zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po ston to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:457b-1: rdo rje'i spyod pa mngon par brtson pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid kyi phyogs bcu rnams [?] de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:457b-2: de bzhin du yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:457b-3: de bzhin du yon tan dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang thabs cig tu phyogs bcur bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:457b-5: yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams mkha' snang gi 'od zer gyis g-yogs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:457b-6: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi 'od zer gyis lhan cig pa dang mthun pa tsam du'ang mi bzod pa'i 'od zer du byas pa de lta kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od rdo rje sems dpa'i 'od kyis mog mog por gyur nas kun tu gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:457b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyag na rdo rje la byang chub sems dpa' dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:457b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa'i sprin rnams kyis yang dag par mchod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:457b-9: kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba bskyed de cang mi gsung ba'i rnam par gnas par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:457b-10: de nas kun tu bzang po rdo rje 'chang chen po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rang gi thugs la bzhag nas ye shes kyi rigs de bskyed pa gsang chen dang bcas pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba gsal bar byed pa'i rgyu rang gi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:458a-4: 'o ma zho ni kun bkram par //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:458a-6: de yi dbus su padma che //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:458a-16: dor ba'i bsam gtan yang dag brtsam //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:458b-24: byang chub sems ni rnam par bsgom //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:473b-12: padma yang dag sbyar bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:473b-14: 'dab ma brgyad pa rnam bsgoms nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:473b-15: ji ltar rigs par snying gar de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:473b-16: bsgom bya gzhan du mi bsam mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:473b-17: thog ma bar ni rnam spangs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:473b-18: sgom pa de yi dgongs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:473b-19: me tog padma sogs g-yogs par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:473b-20: de phyogs su ni rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:473b-21: cho ga shes pas 'dod mchod pa'i; ;sems dpa' 'od mtshungs bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:473b-23: rtse gsum shin tu brtan byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:473b-24: cho ga shes pas nas tsam du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:473b-25: bsams nas lte bar bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:473b-26: kar ni kar sogs me tog che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:473b-27: ser po 'bar ba bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:473b-28: bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos de skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:473b-29: kun tu rnal 'byor bzhi rnams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:473b-30: rnam pa bzhi po rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:473b-31: ji srid nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:473b-32: cho ga shes pas spro bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:473b-33: gang yang sngags pas zla gnyis su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:473b-34: thun bzhir rnam par bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:474a-2: skyo bo bral par bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:474a-3: nya dang sha sogs can bza' la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:474a-4: brtul zhugs can gyis mar sar btung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:474a-5: bslus pa dang yang sa la 'jigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:474a-6: de ltar gang 'di btul zhugs can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:474a-7: cho ga shes pas sangs rgyas gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:474a-8: dngos nyid du de lta bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:474a-9: rang gzugs rnam shes bya min nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:474a-10: sgra ni nyan par byed min nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:474a-11: rnam pa gnyis su de yi sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:474a-12: skye ba min zhing yang yang min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:474a-13: gang zhig kho nar bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:474a-14: gzhan du de dag mi 'gyur nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:474a-15: gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor sbyor la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:474a-16: bskyed nas de la bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:474a-17: bdag po'i rnal 'byor kun bskyed nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:474a-18: mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:474a-20: gzhan du bskyed par 'gyur min nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:474a-21: bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems kyis de skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:474a-22: gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:474a-23: dang po'i ye shes kun las btus pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:474a-24: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams thams cad rang gi ba spu'i khung bu rnams su rab tu bcug nas dam tshig thams cad kyi ye shes 'byung ba byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:474b-0: snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na @474b rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams thams cad rang gi gzugs bud med kyi gzugs su byin gyis brlabs pa kho nar ba spu'i khung bu rnams nas mngon par byung bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:474b-1: de nas btsun mo de rnams thams cad kyis ye shes chen po'i rin po che de yi mchod pa thams cad kyi bkod pas yang dag par mchod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:474b-2: nam mkha'i khams thams cad kun tu bkang zhing snang bar byas nas sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams su gnas par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:474b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje btsun mo thams cad kyi bha ga rnams su rang gi rdo rje yang dag par spyor ba'i rnam pas yang dag par sbyar nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:474b-4: rang gi gzugs de'i tshad du byin gyis rlob par byed pas byin gyis brlabs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:474b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang de'i tshe tshad de kho na bzhin du mkhas pa rnams kyis snga ma ji lta ba'i phyag na rdo rje rigs thams cad dam tshig gi ye shes de kho na nyid byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ye shes chen po'i dam tshig bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:474b-6: dkyil 'khor bzhi yi tshul gyis ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:474b-7: dbus su sngags su rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:474b-8: snying gar dkyil 'khor byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:474b-9: rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:474b-10: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rje bos de skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:474b-11: dkyil 'khor bzhi yi tshul gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:474b-12: rnam snang la sogs rnam bsgom pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:474b-13: de nyid kyis ni kun bskyed nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:474b-14: de nyid mchod par byed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475a-2: rdo rje sems dpa' bsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475a-3: sangs rgyas gzugs ni yang dag bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475a-4: de yi mchod pa byed par bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475a-5: dkyil 'khor bzhi yi tshul gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475a-6: rang rigs la sogs rnam par bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475a-7: dbus su gzugs ni brtan byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475a-8: de yi mchod pa byed par bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475a-9: sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475a-10: spyan ni yang dag bskyed nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475a-11: gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475a-12: dmangs rigs dkar mo rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475a-13: kun sbyor la sogs mtshan nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475a-14: sna tshogs rgyan dang yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475a-15: autpal sngon po dang mtshungs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475a-16: m'a ma k'i ni rtag bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475a-17: me tog chun sogs kyis don bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475a-18: ji ltar rigs par rnam brgyan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475a-19: rig ma chen mo dkar mor grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475a-20: khrag dang mtshungs par bsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475a-21: yid kyi kun sbyor phun tshogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475a-22: bsdus pa yis ni rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475a-23: autpal na mtshungs skal bzang mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475a-24: sngags pas rtag tu bsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475a-25: bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos de skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475a-26: mar sar la sogs kun sbyor gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475a-27: yid du 'ong ba de bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475a-28: chang nyid yid kyis sbyor byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475a-29: gang de nyid ni sgom bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475a-30: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475a-31: rang gi sngags kyis yang dag bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475a-32: skrod par byed pas cho ga kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475a-33: 'di ni bskyed cing bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475a-34: lag pas mgrin pa la sogs bzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475b-0: rkang pa @475b de la sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475b-1: me tog gnyis sogs mtshan nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475b-2: rang gi rdo rje gzhug bsam bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475b-3: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475b-4: khu ba de la ltung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475b-5: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis de skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475b-6: nam mkha'i khams ni kun bkang bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475b-7: byas nas de nyid kyis bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475b-8: me tog bzhi la sogs tshul gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475b-9: de la mchod par byed ces dgongs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475b-10: nyer spyod lnga yi mchod pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475b-11: mchod bdag kun sbyor las mchod bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475b-12: dri gzugs ro dang reg bya ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475b-13: thams cad du de nyid kyis sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475b-14: rdor sems rnams ni blo ldan gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475b-15: sangs rgyas kun gyis bskyed pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475b-16: mnyes dang mchod par rab tu brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475b-17: dgyes par yang ni brjod pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475b-18: 'di yis gsang sngags brub pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475b-19: sgrub pa po rnams rnam rgyal 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475b-20: gsal byed rgyas pa sgrub don du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475b-21: sangs rgyas nyid sogs yang dag 'thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475b-22: gal te chos nyid mi 'gyur ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475b-23: 'di ni sangs rgyas chos nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475b-24: sangs rgyas nyid sogs yongs gzung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475b-25: gzhan du thob par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475b-26: sems kyi mi dge bya min nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475b-27: smad pa'i kun spyod bya min nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475b-28: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475b-29: chos nyid mi 'gyur kun las btus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475b-30: gang gzhan btsun mo rnams nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475b-31: 'dod pa nye bar longs spyod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475b-32: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sbyor ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475b-33: ji ltar 'os par mchod bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:475b-34: sbyin dang tshul khrims de bzhin bzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476a-1: 'di ni sngags pa mkhas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476a-2: cho gas lhag par gnas par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476a-3: rang gi sngags ni yang dag brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476a-4: zla ba lta bur sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476a-5: der ni rdo rje la bsdus pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476a-6: slar yang sngags pas gzhug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476a-7: gzhogs su rin chen rnam bsgom pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476a-9: de rnams kha dog bsdus pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476a-10: rigs kyi dbye ba rtogs par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476a-11: rigs gsum la yang thun mong du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476a-12: rdo rje sems dpa'i yon tan 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476a-13: de yi yi ge yang dag bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476a-14: gzhug la bsam gtan lhur len pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476a-15: las kyi dbye ba sogs rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476a-16: bya ba'i mtshan nyid de rab grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476a-17: ye shes rigs la autpal sngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476a-18: bsdus pa shes pa la yang grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476a-20: chos kyi rigs la'ang dgongs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476a-21: cho ga shes pas lo bcu ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476a-22: btsun mo ye shes rigs la shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476a-23: bsdus pa zhes la brtag bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476a-24: yon tan mdangs ldan bcu gnyis lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476a-25: sngags pas rtag tu chos shes par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476a-26: bcu drug lo ma kun tu brtsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476a-27: kun tu 'dod mchod rigs la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476a-28: nyi shu'i lo can bsten par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476a-29: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyis de skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476a-30: ji srid khu ba yang dag bsdus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476a-31: bcu gnyis lo dang ldan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476a-32: mdor na gang gang 'dod gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476b-0: sna tshogs @476b rgyan dang yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476b-1: me tog chun po sogs brgyan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476b-2: ji ltar rigs par bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476b-3: rnam par snang mdzad sogs byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476b-4: de nas mchod pa yang dag brtsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476b-5: rigs kyi dbye bas las rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476b-6: tsandan gur gum rab tu brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476b-7: bde bar bzhugs shing mdzes byas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476b-8: dkyil 'khor de nyid kyis de bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476b-9: thams cad bsdus pa de bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476b-10: ji ltar dbye ba mi shes na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476b-11: gal te dbye ba de yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476b-13: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyis de skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476b-14: mchen rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476b-15: rgyan du byas pa'i bu mo bdun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476b-16: bcu drug lo yi rnam pa de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476b-17: ji srid bcva brgyad lo lon par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476b-18: shin tu ring min thung ba min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476b-19: phra min dman par skyes pa'ang min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476b-20: mtshungs med gzhon nu ma bsgrub bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476b-22: chog shes pas de bzung la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476b-23: de nyid sgrub thabs kyis bsgrub bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476b-24: 'dzam bu'i gling du dbyangs sogs kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476b-25: mtshan nyid thams cad kyis brgyan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476b-26: bcu drug bsgrubs na chog shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476b-28: khru bzhi ba yi dkyil 'khor ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476b-29: bris nas rtag tu bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476b-30: rig pa'i tshul gyi cho ga yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476b-31: mkhas pas 'bum phrag lnga ru bzlas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476b-32: mar me la sogs tshad kyis te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:476b-33: gzhan du bsgrub bya min pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:477a-1: rgyas thams cad kun tu snang bas de skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:477a-2: khru yi tshad kyi dkyil 'khor du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:477a-3: rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:477a-4: bdud rtsi zhes bya'i khro bo che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:477a-5: byin nas yang dag las rnams brtsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:477a-6: cho ga shes pas de ru yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:477a-7: mtshan ma bkod nas bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:477a-8: dri dang me tog sogs mchod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:477a-9: byas nas bsgrub bya gzhan du min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:477a-11: ri bo dben pa rnams su yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:477a-12: cho ga shes pas bsdus pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:477a-13: rang nyid dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:477a-14: rin chen kun gyis mchod pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:477a-15: rdo rje sems dpa'i mchod pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:477a-16: spyan ras gzigs kyi mgon po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:477a-17: mchod pa zhes ni de la bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:477a-18: thun tshod dang po las 'das par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:477a-19: gnyis par yang dag nyer gnas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:477a-20: rnal 'byor pa yis sgrub par bsgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:477a-22: thun tshod phyed du yang dag 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:477a-23: lnga yi bar mchad rnams su'ang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:477a-24: phyag na rdo rjes byin brlabs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:477a-26: rigs kyi bdag po ltar gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:477a-27: 'jig rten khams ni kun tu yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:477a-28: btsun mo grangs med po ti yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:477a-29: dngos grub rtogs phyir rnam par spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:477a-30: de yi bya bas sangs rgyas nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:477a-31: ri rab kyi ni rdul phran gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:477a-32: phyag na rdo rje kun 'byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:477a-33: sems can rnams kyi byed pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:477b-0: gnyis su med @477b pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por dam tshig thams cad kyi sgrub thabs chen po gsang ba'i mchod pa'i le'u ste brgyad ba rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:477b-1: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang yang dag 'dus nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la 'de skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:477b-2: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad kyi ye shes khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags chen po'i dam tshig sgrub pa po rnams kyis seng ge rnam par rol ba'i dam tshig gi ye shes byed pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba bstan du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:477b-3: de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi tshig nye bar gsan nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:477b-4: rdo rje de rang gi snying gar bzhag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:477b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams la gsung 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:477b-6: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rgyu ci'i phyir de skad gsung /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:477b-7: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gang nges par bstan nus pa ni med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:477b-8: yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'di la ye shes kyi 'od zer yang rnam pa stong du rnam par zhigs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:477b-9: gzhan du na ga la 'gyur zhes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478a-0: de bzhin du ni de lta bu byas nas de nyid bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo @478a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478a-1: rje de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka dang spyi bor zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rang gi gzugs gnas par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes ye shes kyi dam tshig khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyi dam tshig bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478a-3: grangs med 'byung po thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478a-4: de nyid sbyar bas gsang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478a-5: skye ba 'dir nyid sangs rgyas nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478a-7: sangs rgyas bye ba yongs rdzogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478a-8: ye shes sbyor bas gsad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478a-10: rdo rje sems dpa' thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478a-11: padma chen po'i tshad kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478a-12: sems can phung po rnams gzhom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478a-13: chos kyi de nyid ting 'dzin gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478a-14: bcom pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478a-15: cho ga shes pas padma'i tshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478a-17: 'dod mchod de nyid bsgom pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478a-18: de yis dngos grub che zhes bya; ;bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478a-19: nam mkha'i khams ni kun bkang bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478a-20: mtshan nyid des ni gsad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478a-21: de nyid yang 'dir sangs rgyas nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478a-22: skye ba 'di nyid kho na la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478a-23: rnam pa sna tshogs mtha' dag 'thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478a-24: sems can sems ni cho ga yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478a-25: yang dang yang du sbyang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478a-26: gsod pa'i bdag nyid sogs 'byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478b-1: sems can kun gyi sems gang yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478b-3: sna tshogs dngos pos ma gos pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478b-4: sems su brjod pa'i de nyid bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478b-5: cho ga shes pas sangs rgyas yum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478b-6: de nyid nye bar longs spyod bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478b-7: gsang sngags dge ba 'byung ba kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478b-8: gzhan du grub pa nyid mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478b-9: de de sngags pa ma lus pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478b-10: mchog gi tshogs ni yang dag dbyung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478b-11: rdo rje sems dpa' dge 'byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478b-12: gzhan du dgyes par 'gyur min nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478b-13: nye bar longs spyod bya kun tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478b-14: nye bar longs spyod kun brtsam bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478b-15: gzhan du gal te bdag rmongs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478b-17: thams cad bdag nyid bza' bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478b-18: chang ngam gzhan yang rang gis btung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478b-19: sangs rgyas kun gyi sbyin bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478b-21: sha chen rtag tu bza' bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478b-22: til mar yang rung rang btung bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478b-23: cho ga shes pas bshang gci'ang rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478b-24: bza' ba'i bdag nyid can gyis bza'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478b-25: rma yi sgo las byung ba'ang min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478b-26: sangs rgyas sogs la dbul bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478b-27: me tog dri zhim sprin chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478b-28: byas nas thams cad don ji bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478b-29: sngags pas rtag tu smad pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478b-30: btung ba nyid ni 'byung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478b-31: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:478b-32: ye shes blo yis dam tshig brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479a-0: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rjes su gnang bar byed pas de @479a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479a-2: sngags pas rtag tu dkyil 'khor ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479a-3: bshang dang gci bas so so ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479a-4: nyal bar byed pa la sogs sam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479a-5: bsam pa shin tu sra brtan bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479a-6: bshad dang gci bas bkang ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479a-7: gru bzhi kun tu bskyed nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479a-8: rang gzugs de yi dbus su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479a-9: sna rtser nas kyi dgang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479a-10: bcom ldan sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479a-11: des chags bdag po dka' ba min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479a-12: gang gzhan gsum po bsdus pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479a-13: 'dir gzhan so sor gnas de min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479a-14: cho ga shes pas phyis 'dir ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479a-15: bya ste gzhan rnams dang sbyar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479a-16: ye shes 'khor los bskul ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479a-18: rang ngam gal te gzhan yang rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479a-19: de nyid sbyor bar mi byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479a-20: ji srid nam mkha' kun 'byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479a-21: sangs rgyas nyid ni thob mi byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479a-22: nga ni mnar med nga 'jigs rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479a-23: nga ni sdug bsngal nga bde ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479a-24: zhes sdang nga la de bzhin rmongs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479a-25: nga ni 'dod chags so sor gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479a-27: gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes khong du chud par byed pa zhes bya ba'i mchog tu gsang chen gyi le'u ste dgu pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes thob pa'i 'bras bu @479b dang rgyu dag gis rdo rje sems dpa' thams cad kyi bcud kyi dam tshig gi gsang chen bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479b-1: dgra bcom la phyag bya min nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479b-2: dge slong yang rung phyag bya min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479b-3: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479b-4: thob pa phyag ste phyag bya min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479b-5: rang gzugs su ni rang gzugs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479b-6: bsams nas de nyid cho ga las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479b-7: snying gar rdo rje sogs byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479b-8: yang dag mchod byar de sbyar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479b-9: gal te rdo rje sems dpa' 'ang rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479b-11: rang gi byang chub sems smras pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479b-12: mgo bo tshal ba bdun du 'gas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479b-13: bha gar ling ga rab bzhag nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479b-14: gsang sngags yang nas yang du bzla //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479b-15: rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479b-16: rang gzugs la ni bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479b-17: sangs rgyas slob dpon de nyid 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479b-18: rtag tu bsrung ba'i khyad par las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479b-19: gzhan du slob dpon rnams kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479b-20: sangs rgyas nyid ni thob mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479b-21: rang gi gzugs su rnam bsgoms nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479b-22: de nyid las ni phra mo'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479b-23: byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479b-24: slob dpon sangs rgyas su bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479b-25: sgrub po rnams kyi ye shes 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479b-27: dam tshig la sogs sbyor pa 'dis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479b-29: dam rgya shin tu rnal 'byor gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479b-30: rang gi snying gar gzugs bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479b-31: de la rdo rje yang dag bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:479b-32: ji srid 'dod pas brtan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480a-2: d'i ni dam tshig mchog yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480a-3: ji srid dngos grub bsgrub bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480a-4: rtag tu de yis bsrung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480a-5: bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems kyis de skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480a-6: rang gi gzugs ni yang dag bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480a-7: rang gzugs la sogs mtshan nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480a-8: snying gar bdud rtsir brjod pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480a-9: de yi sngags ni yang dag brtsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480a-10: 'di yang dam tshig ye shes te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480a-11: kun tu dri ma bsal ba nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480a-12: 'dod pa'i dngos grub brtan pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480a-13: brtul zhugs brtson pas bsrung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480a-14: sangs rgyas thams cad rnam bsgoms nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480a-15: bsgrub bya'i rnam par bsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480a-16: rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480a-17: snying po de la bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480a-18: cho ga shes pas 'di rtag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480a-19: dus gsum du yang bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480a-20: gal te gzhan du bzlas byas sam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480a-21: bsgrub na de ni ma yin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480a-22: rig ma gzugs dang gzugs sogs can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480a-23: 'bar ba'i phreng bas rgyan byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480a-24: sems dpa' rin chen yang dag bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480a-25: de yi lag tu'ang rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480a-26: bsdus pa yis ni bsgom bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480a-27: ji srid dngos grub rab mthong byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480a-28: gzhan du gal te bdag rmongs na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480a-29: de yi sbyin pa der mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480a-30: shin tu rnam bkra shin dri med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480a-31: ye shes rin chen cod pan du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480a-32: bzhag nas sgrub pa yi ni mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480b-0: sa stengs lhan cig @480b rgyu bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480b-1: rdor sems bdag nyid dngos grub nga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480b-2: rdo rje sems dpas byin gyis brlabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480b-3: rtag tu rdo rje ye shes chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480b-4: go 'phang du ni bsgral bar bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480b-5: ye shes rdo rjes dngos grub nga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480b-6: bdud rtsi zhes sogs byin gyis brlabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480b-7: nam mkha' mchog tu phra ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480b-8: bzang po nga ni rnam dpyod byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480b-9: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad ces gsungs so; ;de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes kyi gsang sngags yongs su dag pa'i de kho na nyid byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480b-10: rdo rje sems dpa' skye sgom pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480b-11: thugs kyi rdo rje zhes rab brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480b-12: sems la de ni bsgoms nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480b-13: ye shes rdo rje rab gzhug bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480b-14: rdo rje rang bzhin dag pa'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480b-15: gsung gi rdo rjer yongs su brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480b-16: dag pa'i ye shes rnam bsgoms pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480b-17: sku gsung dag par rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480b-18: rdo rje'i byin rlob shin tu gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480b-19: mi phyed rdo rje'i sku nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480b-20: sangs rgyas sku yi rang bzhin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480b-21: cho ga shes pas byin gyis brlab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480b-22: rdo rje 'di yis byin rlabs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480b-23: 'di yis byang chub thob par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480b-24: cho ga shes pas zla drug gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480b-25: sangs rgyas nyid 'dir thob par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480b-26: chags skyes chos kyis ma gos pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:480b-27: rdo rje de rnams thams cad 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:481a-0: @481a *// de ltar de nyid chog byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:481a-1: dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:481a-2: de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi kun tu spyod pa'i dam tshig bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:481a-3: mi bslu ba yi tshul gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:481a-4: rdo rje ye shes gsum 'byung bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:481a-5: de kun nye bar longs spyod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:481a-6: sangs rgyas kun spyod nyid du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:481a-7: nam mkha'i khams ni kun bkang ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:481a-8: sangs rgyas rnams ni gal te bcom //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:484b-27: rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag dbyung //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:484b-29: ye shes sbyor bas thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:484b-30: 'dod yon lnga yis mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:484b-31: khu ba de la yang dag bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:484b-32: mchod par byed pa bskyed par bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:484b-33: mkha' khams gtsug tor thams cad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:484b-34: yongs su gang bar rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485a-1: po kun tu skul bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485a-2: de nas phyag na rdo rjes slar yang 'dod pa'i khams thams cad du mnyam par 'jug pa 'byung ba'i rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485a-3: rigs thams cad kyi thun mong gi seng ge rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485a-4: chog shes pas sna tshogs mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485a-5: 'o ma dang zhor rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485a-6: rin chen bzhi yi rang bzhin dbus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485a-7: ri bo de la bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485a-8: logs bzhi pa la gra bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485a-9: sgo bzhi par ni rab tu brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485a-11: gzhogs rnams su ni rnam par bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485a-12: rin chen kun gyi gdan dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485a-13: rtag tu zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485a-14: sangs rgyas slob dpon khyad par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485a-15: bsam gtan brtson pas sbyor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485a-16: sngags pas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485a-17: de yi dbus su bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485a-18: mthe chung mtho las 'das pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485a-19: sor bzhi'i ngos dang grva rnams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485a-20: ngos rnams su ni rtag tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485a-21: bdud rtsi zhes ni bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485a-22: 'bar ba'i phreng ba la sogs gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485a-23: mi sdug mche gtsigs 'jigs par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485a-24: sngags pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485a-25: gnas lnga rnams su rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485a-26: dbus su rdo rje ral gri ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485b-0: @485b shin tu rnam 'byes shin tu mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485b-2: padma r'a ga dbang po mtshungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485b-4: kha dog dkar po shin tu mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485b-5: ral pa'i con pan kun rdzogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485b-6: sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485b-7: sangs rgyas slob dpon cho ga yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485b-8: shar phyogs su ni rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485b-9: rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485b-10: sna tshogs rin chen rnam brgyan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485b-12: autpal sngon po dang mtshungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485b-13: lho ru rtag tu slob dpon gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485b-14: bsgom bya gzhan du mi sgom mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485b-15: chos kyi rdo rje yang dag bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485b-17: me tog chun po dmar pos gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485b-18: nub phyogs su ni bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485b-20: 'dod pa'i rdo rje yang dag bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485b-21: gser dag gi ni ye shes rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485b-22: byang du yang ni bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485b-23: grva ru lha mo ri dbang phyug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485b-24: ji lta'i gnas su rnam bsam bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485b-25: bud med mtshan nyid yongs rdzogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485b-26: mi mo'i rgyan gyis brgyan gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485b-27: chags dang chags bral skad cig ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485b-28: sngags pas yid 'ong bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485b-29: sgo yi phyogs rnams thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485b-30: rig ma gzhan gyis mi thub ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485b-31: g-yas brkyang zhabs kyis mnan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:485b-33: de rnams thams cad rang gzugs su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:486a-2: sangs rgyas slob dpon de rtag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:486a-3: 'dod yon lnga yi mchog rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:486a-4: 'bul bar byed pa rtag tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:486a-5: de ltas dgyes 'gyur gzhan du min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:486a-6: rang gi khu ba yang dag bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:486a-7: mchod pa bskyed par bshad pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:486a-8: gzugs brnyan des ni nam mkha'i dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:486a-9: yongs su gang bar rnams bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:486a-10: dpag bsam ljon shing rin chen che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:486a-11: yid bzhin nor bu shin tu mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:486a-12: rigs kyi dbye bshes pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:486a-13: de rnams kha dog rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:486a-14: ji skad gsungs pa'i gzugs des ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:486a-15: dbang bskur ba ni gzung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:486a-16: cho ga shes pas de yi tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:486a-17: bya ba bum pa bsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:486a-18: sangs rgyas gzugs sogs thams cad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:486a-19: mchod bzhin par ni rnam par bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:486a-20: yang dag sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:486a-21: shin tu dbang bskur mnyam pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:486a-22: skye ba 'dir nyid sangs rgyas nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:486a-23: thob ste 'dir ni the tshom med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:486a-24: rang sngags khro bo mtshungs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:486a-25: phan pa'i sbyin pa sbyin par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:486a-26: de ni dus yun mi ring bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:486a-27: dngos grub skye ba lta bur thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:486a-28: blo ldan sangs rgyas slob dpon gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:486a-29: rtag tu de yi dam tshig ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:486a-30: gang kho na yi rigs 'byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:486b-0: gnyis su med ba mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen por bsam gtan chen po'i le'u ste bcu gcig @486b pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:486b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes slar yang nam mkha'i khams thams cad ye shes kyi snang bas yang dag par skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:486b-2: dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid skyed par byed pa'i sngags 'di gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:486b-3: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta dzny'a nod bha b'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:486b-4: sngags 'di gsungs ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa brgya stong phrag g-yos shing rab tu g-yos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:486b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes slar yang kun nas kun tu snang ba'i dam tshig rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la snyoms par zhugs te sngags 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:486b-6: aom sam gra ha dzny'a nod bh'a b'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:486b-7: de kho na nyid kyi snying po chen po 'di gsungs ma thag tu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:486b-8: de nas gang nam mkha'i khams thams cad 'od zer 'bar ba chen pos kun tu snang zhing yang dag par mthong bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:486b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes slar yang rang bzhin dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sngags 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:486b-10: aom dharma dzny'a nod bh'a w'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:486b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs ma thag tu; sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mthar thug par ye shes kyi rjes su mthun pas kun tu snang bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes slar yang rang bzhin gyis dpal kun 'byung @487a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487a-1: ba yang dag par 'byung ba rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sngags 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487a-2: aom k'a ma dzny'a nod bh'a b'a ya sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487a-3: de bzhin nyid du kun shes phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487a-4: de nyid du ni sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487a-5: rang gi gzugs kyis bzhag nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487a-6: de kun de la bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487a-7: bskyed pa la sogs kun 'byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487a-8: rang gi sngags nyid kyis ni bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487a-9: mang po phan tshun yang dag sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487a-10: phyag rgya der ni rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487a-11: blo ldan ye shes rigs la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487a-12: sor mo'i rnam pa sbyor bar bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487a-13: rdo rje'i rnam pas kun sbyar nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487a-14: rin chen rnam pas sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487a-15: padma'i rnam pas kun sbyar nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487a-16: 'di ni chos kyi rigs su brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487a-17: rtse gsum rnam pa'i dbye ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487a-18: de nyid du ni bcing bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487a-19: bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems kyis de skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487a-20: bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba sems dpa' chen po skyed par byed pa'i le'u bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487a-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes slar yang bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487a-22: dam tshig chen po'i dngos grub kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487a-23: de nas yang dag rab bshad bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487a-25: rdo rje ye shes lta bus te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487b-0: @487b dngos grub chen po zhes bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487b-1: sar pa legs par bkal ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487b-2: tshad dang ldan pa mdzes pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487b-3: thig gis mkhas pas ci nus kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487b-4: dkyil 'khor la ni thig gdab po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487b-5: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487b-6: rta babs bzhi yis brgyan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487b-7: thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487b-8: dar dang me tog chun pos brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487b-9: grva yi cha rnams thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487b-10: sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487b-11: rdo rje rin chen gyis spras par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487b-12: phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487b-13: rtag tu bsdus pa'i cho ga yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487b-14: rim pa gsum ni byang ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487b-15: cho ga shes pas shar du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487b-16: ye shes zhes ni dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487b-17: lhor ni 'bad pas bsdus pa zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487b-18: brjod pa rtag tu bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487b-19: cho ga yis ni byang phyogs su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487b-20: chos kyi rigs ni rtag tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487b-21: sngags pas 'dod pa kun rigs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487b-22: gsum pa ru yang mnyam par bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487b-23: shar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487b-24: rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gdugs dkar dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487b-25: rig mchen mo spyan dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487b-26: mdzod spu yang ni nye bar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487b-27: rdo rje 'chang gi lho ru ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487b-28: bdud rtsi zhes dang stobs po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487b-29: rdo rje khu tshur m'a ma k'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487b-30: nye ba nyid du gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487b-31: bcom ldan 'das kyi byang du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487b-33: khro gnyer rim par ldan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487b-34: rig ma chen mo dkar zhes dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487b-35: khro gnyer can ma'ang mnyam par bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:487b-36: chog shes pas de dbus su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488a-2: phyag rgya thams cad nyid du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488a-3: rtse mo lnga pa rnam pa sgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488a-4: dkyil 'khor gsum par slob dpon gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488a-5: ya dri tstsha yas s'u tram bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488a-6: sgo rnams thams cad nyid du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488a-7: rdo rje lcags sgrog la sogs bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488a-8: ji ltar rigs par phyogs kun tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488a-9: 'jig rten skyong ba dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488a-10: shar phyogs dbang po lha rgyal dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488a-11: 'dod pa spyod pa'i lha rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488a-12: gnas gtsang ma yang dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488a-13: me phyogs kun du me yi lha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488a-14: drang srong chen po lnga mngon shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488a-15: lho phyogs yi dvags rnams kyi bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488a-16: gshin rje dang ni ma mo bdun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488a-17: bden bral phyogs su yi dvags kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488a-18: dbang po dang ni 'byung po kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488a-19: nub kyi phyogs su klu yi bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488a-20: chu lha dang ni klu rnams kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488a-21: rlung gi phyogs su rlung lha dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488a-22: rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488a-23: byang gi phyogs su gnod sbyin bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488a-24: lus ngan dang ni gnod sbyin kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488a-25: dbang ldan phyogs su dbang phyug ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488a-26: 'byung po kun gyi bdag po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488a-27: ji skad gsungs pa'i cho ga yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488a-28: bum pa dgod dang gdan sogs bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488a-29: lha rnams kun gyi rgyal po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488a-30: der ni dgod par bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488a-31: mkhas pas me tog dri sogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488a-32: mchod pa'i cho ga byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488a-33: mnyes pa'i rigs pas mnyes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488a-34: de ltar rgyas 'gyur gzhan du min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488a-35: 'dir ni sngon mthar de rnams kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488a-36: nya dang chang sogs rab sbyin bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488b-0: chog @488b shas pas gsang ba'i mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488b-1: sgo bzhi rnams su brtag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488b-2: khu ba der ni gzung byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488b-3: thams cad du ni dbul bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488b-4: rig ma'i tshul gyis chog yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488b-5: de ni yang yang dgyes par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488b-6: mkhas pas dga' ba'i rnam pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488b-7: thog mar gtor ma sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488b-9: gnyis pa ru ni yang dag gzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488b-10: sngags pas khyad par gsum pa ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488b-11: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488b-12: de nyid brjod pa de yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488b-13: gang gsungs sbyin sreg las rnams bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488b-14: de tshe slob ma dbang bskur ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488b-15: las rnams so sor bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488b-16: de gzhan bsam pas bum pa ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488b-17: rdo rje sems dpa'i rab sbyor gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488b-18: lhag ma'i sangs rgyas zhes bya bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488b-19: de nyid rigs par yang dag bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488b-20: rtag tu sangs rgyas slob dpon gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488b-21: de yi tshul 'di smra bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488b-22: sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488b-23: lam gsum lam ni 'jug byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488b-24: dbang bskur chen po de yi ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488b-25: nam mkha' ji srid yang dag 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488b-26: khyad par du yang 'dir smras pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488b-28: yid bzhin rin chen nor bsten nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488b-30: gzhan yang gal te sems can gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488b-31: mthong bar 'gyur zhes bya ba nyon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488b-32: skye ba bdun gyi nang dus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488b-34: sangs rgyas slob dpon gang nyid du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:488b-35: ye shes rgya mtsho gnas par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489a-2: rtag tu sangs rgyas mchod par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489a-3: sangs rgyas slob dpon ji gsungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489a-4: de yis rang gi slob ma de'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489a-5: dam tshig lnga po byin nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489a-6: rab tu 'bad pas smra bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489a-7: sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489a-9: sgrub po rnams kyis ci 'dra der //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489a-10: yid bzhin nor bu lta bur blang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489a-11: dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs su bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad nam mkha'i khams thams cad du spro ba'i rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489a-14: snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489a-15: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de nam mkha'i khams thams cad du sems kyis gang bar byas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la rab tu stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489a-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bsgrub pa'i mchog ces bya ba rig ma'i tshul la sogs pa'i las can gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489a-18: khru ni sum cu'i khyon tsam du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489a-19: kun nas yongs su zlum por ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489b-2: nam mkha' ru ni 'di bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489b-3: bsam gtan sbyor bas bsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489b-4: 'dzam bu'i gling ni thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489b-6: shing rta'i 'khor lo'i tshad kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489b-7: padmas g-yogs par rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489b-8: khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489b-9: drag tu dgod pa chen po sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489b-10: rtag tu de yi dkyil 'khor gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489b-11: de yi gzugs ni rnam bsgom nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489b-12: khro chen khro gnyer rim par ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489b-14: ji ltar rigs par kun bskyed nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489b-15: sgom par byed pa de der bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489b-16: khro bo chen po dbyug pa sngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489b-18: sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489b-19: 'joms pa po ni rab tu gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489b-20: ji skad gsungs pa'i gzugs gsum gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489b-21: nam mkha'i khams ni kun tu gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489b-22: yi ge'i gzugs ni kun bskyed nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489b-23: bdag nyid snying gar rnam bsam bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489b-24: snying ga'i gzugs ni de rnams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489b-25: lha yi rnam par sgom par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489b-26: slar ni sngags pas bsdu bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489b-27: de nyid la ni gzhug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489b-28: chog shes pas bskal ba'i mer //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489b-29: bsams nas bsam gtan yang dag brtsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489b-31: brtsun mo rtag tu bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489b-32: lha nyid yang dag bskyed nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489b-33: de yi dbus su rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489b-34: rang gzugs snying gar bsams nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:489b-35: de yi dbus su rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490a-1: gzugs snying gar bsams nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490a-2: ha yig tu ni rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490a-3: 'di de sngags rnams thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490a-4: bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490a-5: 'di ni dang po'i bsam gtan brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490a-6: rab tu 'bad pas bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490a-7: rtag tu rigs kyi bdag po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490a-8: bskal par bsregs par rnam bsgoms nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490a-9: sngags pas de yi rnam pa der //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490a-10: bsam gtan brtson pas bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490a-11: sangs rgyas gzugs kyi rab sbyor gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490a-12: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490a-13: rang gi gzugs kyis kun bskyed nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490a-14: ba spu'i khung bur 'di spro bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490a-15: ji skad gsungs pa'i gzugs gsum gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490a-16: nam mkha'i khams ni kun tu bkang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490a-17: 'od zer lnga yi rab sbyor gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490a-18: rang lus su ni rab gzhug bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490a-19: rig ma'i rgyal mo sogs sbyor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490a-20: de rnams thams cad yongs brtag bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490a-21: sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' khams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490a-22: yongs su gang bar rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490a-23: rang lus su ni rnam bsgoms nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490a-24: thams cad der ni rab gzhug bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490a-25: gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por rig ma'i tshul la sogs pa'i las can gyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490a-26: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po gsang sngags thams cad kyi gsang chen rig ma'i tshul gyi las gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490b-0: @490b nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490b-1: dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490b-2: dpag tshad kyi ni grangs gyi khyon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490b-3: kun nas yongs su zlum por ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490b-4: gsal ba gsal bar mtshungs bsams nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490b-5: dbus su bdag nyid rnam bsam bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490b-6: 'bad pas gnas lnga rnams su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490b-7: rnam snang mdzad chen gzugs bsams nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490b-8: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490b-9: de rnams thams cad yongs brtag bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490b-10: snying gar rdo rje sems dpa' ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490b-11: yang dag bskyed nas rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490b-12: cho ga shes pas nyi rnam par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490b-13: nam mkha'i khams ni gang bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490b-14: lha la sogs pa'i sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490b-15: slar yang de ni rab gzhug bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490b-16: de nyid tshul ni dge ba 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490b-17: rigs kyi dbye bas rtogs par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490b-18: gzhan du gsang ba'i bsam gtan ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490b-20: gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por rig ma'i las kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490b-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam bar snang mdzad lha thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi tshul bzlas pa'i chog ston bar mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490b-22: nam mkhar 'phrul ni ston par ram //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490b-23: gang du sems ni rab dgyes byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490b-24: dbang chen dkyil 'khor bsams nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490b-25: rang gi dkyil 'khor mchod bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490b-26: me tog bzang po de dbus su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:490b-27: de nyid sbyor bas bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491a-2: bsgom bya gzhan du brtson mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491a-3: snying ga'i dbus son phra mo ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491a-4: dri med ye shes dkyil 'khor ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491a-6: chu yi rnam par dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491a-7: de la sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491a-8: dang po gsang ba rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491a-9: rtse mo lnga pa rnam bsgoms nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491a-10: slar yang de nyid la sbyar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491a-11: blo dang ldan pas gnas lnga ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491a-12: gzugs brnyan yang ni yang dag bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491a-13: de nyid yi ge'i tshul mthun pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491a-14: bsam gtan 'byung ba bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491a-15: cho ga shes pas yig rnams kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491a-16: phreng ba bskyed nas bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491a-17: nas kyi tshad 'di thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491a-18: bsam gtan 'byung ba bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491a-20: rtag tu nam mkha' gang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491a-21: de nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491a-22: gang ba de la grags pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491a-23: yi ge gcig gi gsang sngags kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491a-24: rang gzugs rnam par bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491a-25: rigs kyi bdag po 'byung ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491a-26: yi ge gsum gyi rtag shes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491a-27: yi ge lnga la sogs gzung bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491a-31: rigs kyi dbye bas las rnams kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491b-4: 'jig rten khams ni kun nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491b-5: cho ga shes pas snang ba bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491b-6: ge sar ser po dang mtshungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491b-8: sgom pa'i go 'phang gis bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491b-9: the tshom med par bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491b-10: de nyid 'byung ba gang gsungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491b-11: rang gzugs yang dag bskyed nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491b-12: snying gar me tog bsams nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491b-13: dkyil 'khor de la bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491b-14: cho ga shes pas de'i steng du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491b-15: snying po phyag rgya rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491b-16: ji lta'i go 'phang kun bskyed nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491b-17: ye shes de nyid rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491b-18: bha gar aa yig nges phyung nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491b-19: sangs rgyas mchod pa la sogs bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491b-20: 'jig rten khams ni kun nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491b-21: cho ga shes pas spro bar bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491b-22: thog ma bar dang tha mar ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491b-23: slar yang bsdu bar bsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491b-24: zla 'od lta bur yang dag sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491b-25: rang lus su yang bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491b-26: 'di ni de nyid tshul dge ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491b-27: rigs gsum du yang rtogs par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491b-28: bya dang khyad pa yang dag sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491b-29: sgom pa de ni 'grub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491b-30: sems kyi kun sbyor mtshan nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491b-31: gal te chags la chags par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491b-32: bsam gtan 'dus la rab bzhugs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491b-33: de la zhugs par bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491b-34: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491b-35: sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491b-36: sgrub po rnams kyi de nyid 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:491b-37: dngos grub bsgrub la dam tshig mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:492a-2: ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin bzhin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:492a-3: sangs rgyas slob dpon yang dag bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:492a-4: snying gar de ni dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:492a-5: rang sngags mchog gi phyag rgya ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:492a-6: bsams nas de yi snying gar dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:492a-7: 'thung dang za ba'i dus rnams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:492a-8: nye bar longs spyod byed rnams su'ang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:492a-9: dri dang gzugs sogs bya ba rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:492a-10: 'di ni de kho na nyid brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:492a-11: lha sbyor sangs rgyas slob dpon gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:492a-12: rang gi bde ba rtag tu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:492a-13: cho ga shes pas dbul bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:492a-14: gzhan du 'grub par byed min nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:492a-15: 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:492a-16: bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:492a-17: ye shes rnams ni kun gyi gsang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:492a-18: sngags kyi dngos grub byed de nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:492a-19: rang gzhan sems can thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:492a-21: de bzhin rang gzugs bsams la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:492a-22: bsten dang yon rnams kun dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:492a-23: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:492a-24: sangs rgyas ye shes rab sgrub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:492a-25: rdo rje sems dpa' rab sgrub pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:492a-26: rdo rje ye shes sprul pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:492a-27: gnas bzhi rnams kyi kun sbyor gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:492a-28: lha yi sbyor ba mtshungs pa la //
