K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:500a-17: gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:500a-18: ghu ti ni h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:500b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes bskyed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms @500b par zhugs nas rang gi sngags 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:500b-1: aom shve te p'anda ra b'a si ni dza t'a ma ku ta dh'a ri ni sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:500b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig pa'i rgyal po 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:500b-3: aom dh'u: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rig pa'i rgyal po la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:500b-6: grihn'a pa ya grihna pa ya h'um; a'a na ya ho bha ga w'am bidy'a r'a dza h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:500b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das chos rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sngags 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:500b-8: aom aa mri todbha bodbha b'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:500b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa 'joms pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:500b-10: nyon mongs pa za ba'i sngags 'di gsungs so; ;aom kle sh'a sa ni bi dza ye sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:500b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas chos kyi 'khor lo'i gtsug tor 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:500b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzi brjid kyi mchgo ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gzi brjid phung po 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:500b-20: bi da ra bi da ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501a-1: bcom ldan 'das slar yang rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501a-2: rgyal ba'i gtsug tor 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501a-3: aom dza yoshn'i sha dzva la dzva la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501a-7: ha na ha na h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das dkar po 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501a-9: gtsug tor gdugs dkar po 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501a-10: aom ma ma ma ma h'um ni:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501a-12: rig ma chen mo'i mchog 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501a-13: aom t'a re tu ta t'a re tu re sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nges par sgom pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501a-15: khro bo gzegs ma'i sngags chen po 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501a-16: aom ka ni dhu ni h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501a-17: 'jig rten gsum 'gugs par byed pa'i sngags shin tu ma rungs pa'i las te ji srid du gdon gzhan 'byung ba gang yin pa de'ang de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor bsgoms pas las rnam pa gsum byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501a-18: mi g-yo zhes bya'i khro bo che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501a-19: gshin rje mthar byed gsum 'byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501a-20: kun nas sangs rgyas zhing rnams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501a-21: khams gsum pa yang nges 'joms byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501b-0: khro bo chen po rta @501b mgrin dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501b-1: khro gnyer rim par ldan gyur gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501b-2: rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501b-4: stobs chen bdud rtsi zhes grags dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501b-6: nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501b-7: the tshom med par 'joms par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501b-8: 'bum du bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501b-9: kun du son par byed pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501b-10: blo ldan sangs rgyas nyid thob pa'ang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501b-11: 'gugs par byed par the tshom med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501b-12: khro gnyer tsee ka ta rig ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501b-14: lha min chen po sogs sbyor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501b-15: g-yul du rgyal bar byed pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501b-16: khro bo gzegs ma'i mchog rtser skyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501b-17: sngags pas 'bum phrag gcig bzlas bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501b-18: khro bo'i sems kyis sbyar byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501b-19: nges par sangs rgyas kyang 'jigs byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501b-20: lag par de ni yang dag bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501b-21: mi smra der son bsam pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501b-22: pha rol dpung ni rengs par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501b-23: brgya byin gyi yang the tshom med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501b-24: gzi brjid phung po bzlas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501b-25: 'bum phrag gsum du legs bskor na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501b-26: brgya byin sde yang rengs par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501b-28: sgrol ma sgrol len yang dag 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501b-30: 'og gi sbyor ba bsgoms pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501b-31: rdo rje'i sde yang rengs par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501b-32: de yi snying po'i mchog skyes gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501b-33: rigs dang rigs dbang rig par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:501b-34: de dang yang na 'di nyid du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502a-3: gzhan du dmar por nges sbyar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502a-4: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502a-5: sngags thams cad kyi rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u bco lnga ba rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis sngags thams cad kun las btus pa'i le'u gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502a-7: zhi ba rgyas pa sogs las la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502a-8: rang gzugs rnam pa bsgom pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502a-9: thugs kar ye shes yang dag 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502a-10: cod pan ye shes chos dbang phyug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502a-11: sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam bsgoms nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502a-12: rin chen sna tshogs mtshungs pa'i 'od //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502a-13: rnal 'byor pas bsdus gong bur bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502a-14: sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502a-15: khro bo rnams kyi ston pa 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502a-17: de yis ngo bo rnam bsgoms pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502a-18: rigs dang rigs su 'di bstan no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502a-19: rigs kyi dbang phyug rnam bsgoms nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502a-20: kha dog lnga pa legs mdzes par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502a-21: sgom pa'i go 'phang gis bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502a-22: slar yang rigs kyi bdag po'i sngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502a-23: 'di nyid bsgom par bya ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502a-24: gtsug tor yang ni rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502a-25: 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502a-26: dgyes dang mgu bar byed par bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502a-27: dngos grub thams cad byed par 'dod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502b-0: rdo rje ye shes sogs @502b rdzogs byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502b-1: rig ma la sogs thams cad kyi'ang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502b-2: rig pa'i rgyal po rnam 'joms byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502b-3: pho nya mos kyang thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502b-4: rdo rje sems dpa' rnam sgom pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502b-6: rang gzugs rnam pa sgom pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502b-7: 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502b-8: sngags kyi dam tshig 'byung ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502b-9: sangs rgyas kun gyi phan 'dod pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502b-10: rdo rje dpa' bo'i mchog gis gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502b-11: sngags thams cad kun las btus pa'i le'u bcu drug pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skrod par byed pa'i las 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502b-13: skrod pa la sogs bya ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502b-14: sangs rgyas de nyid ye shes can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502b-15: khro bo gsum po bsdus pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502b-16: rdo rje 'byung bas grags pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502b-17: gshin rje gshed ni ye shes rigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502b-18: bsdus pa'i don la mchog rtser skyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502b-19: khro bo chen po rta mgrin ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502b-20: chos kyi ye shes rigs su bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502b-21: stong phrag gam ni brgya yang rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502b-22: ther 'bum gcig tu bzlas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502b-23: rang nyid sangs rgyas shes pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502b-24: cho ga shes pas skrod par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502b-25: thod pa gsum la kun bzhag nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502b-26: lho yi phyogs kyi dur khrod du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502b-28: rdo dang shing gi sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502b-29: dngos po med pas yang dag brtsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:502b-30: rdo dang phub ma yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503a-2: khrag dang phabs su yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503a-3: nim pa'i 'dab mas bza' bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503a-4: ta la'i 'dab ma la bri bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503a-6: tsher ma can gyis bris nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503a-7: nim pa'i 'dab ma khar bcug nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503a-8: sbyor ba'i gnas su gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503a-9: lha chen po yi 'og tu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503a-10: dri ma med pa kun gzung bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503a-11: chog shes pas lan bdun du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503a-12: mngon par sngags te yang dag brtsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503a-13: dgra yi sgo'am yang na grong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503a-14: grong khyer ram ni kun 'byung ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503a-15: gnas 'di rnams su phung po ni; ;kun nas skrod par byed pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503a-16: snying po de la mdor bsdus pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503a-17: bya ba tsog bu'i stan la 'dug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503a-18: dri ma med pa'i gzugs byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503a-19: khro bo khro bo'i mchog 'byung ba; ;yon tan stong phrag kyang bskyed nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503a-20: rtag tu sangs rgyas kyang thob byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503a-21: nyi ma bdun nam so sor byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503a-23: mgo bo tshal pa bdun du 'gas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503a-24: mi phyed rdo rje rang gis gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skrod pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503a-26: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes par byas pa'i las 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503a-27: sangs rgyas slob dpon 'dab bzang nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503b-0: rdo rje'i skyil krung du @503b gnas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503b-1: bya dka'i nye bar longs spyod kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503b-2: gang de 'tsho zhing gnas par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503b-3: brjod pa'i lhag ma bstan par bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503b-4: 'gro ba dang zhi bar nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503b-6: mthon po min nyid slob ma yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503b-7: chos kyi dus su 'ang sdig pa sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503b-8: gnas bya gal te rmongs pa de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503b-10: sngags tsam gal te tshangs pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503b-11: lag pa gnyis kyis yang dag brtsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503b-12: ji srid nam mkha' yang dag 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503b-14: bud med gsang min brjod bya min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503b-15: gang zhig la la slob dpon ched //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503b-16: bde dang lus sems sdug bsngal ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503b-17: sbyor ba ji srid 'tsho yi bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503b-18: gal te slob dpon rnams kyi bka'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503b-19: dga' ba'i sems kyis byas gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503b-20: de tshe bdag la sangs rgyas sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503b-22: de la ji srid 'tsho yi bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503b-23: brda yis kun du gnas par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503b-24: dku ru brten pa'i lag pa sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503b-26: dngos grub 'bras bu don gnyer bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503b-27: slob dpon ming nas smos mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503b-28: ji srid nam mkha' yang dag 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du bya'o zhes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503b-31: bza' ba la yang rang slob shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503b-32: sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:503b-33: de yi ming gi yi ge gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504a-2: sangs rgyas grangs med bsad byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504a-4: gang tshe kha cig yon tan 'dis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504a-5: bstod na bsod nams yang dag 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504a-6: de tshe slob dpon rtog med pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504a-7: gzhan du gal te rmongs pa bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504a-9: gang tshe de be m'a p'a ti //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504a-10: gus pas nyan sogs bsnyen pa gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504a-11: de tshe slob ma sngags zhu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504a-12: ji ltar kha cig slob dpon rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504a-13: bde ba dngos su mthong bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504a-14: gang zhig la la slob dpon rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504a-17: slob dpon gang zhig tshol byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504a-18: de ni de la dbul bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504a-19: gzhan du dngos grub med pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504a-20: slob ma'i ma brtag slob dpon gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504a-21: chung ma'i don du bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504a-22: yang na sring mo de byin nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504a-24: slob dpon gang zhig slob ma'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504a-25: phyag 'tshal ba ni bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504a-26: bskal pa drug cur de dmyal ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504a-28: de ltar yon tan khyad 'phags kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504a-29: zla ba drug gis rab gsal bya; ;gal te gzhan du bdag rmongs na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504a-31: gang nyid slob dpon tshol byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504a-32: de nyid so sor bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504b-0: rdo rje ye shes rab bskul @504b bas; ;dngos grub yangs par der 'gro 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504b-2: bsod nams 'byung bar shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504b-3: slob dpon 'di yi rgyud la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504b-4: de lta bu sogs gsal bya min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504b-5: de ltar bdag nyid dag pa thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504b-6: chos kyi de nyid cho gas gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504b-7: de yis slob dpon rab gsal bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504b-9: sangs rgyas gnas la gnas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504b-10: gang de mgu nas rdor sems mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504b-11: myur du 'grub byed gzhan du min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504b-12: sangs rgyas sangs rgyas nyid thob pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504b-15: sangs rgyas ye shes rang nyid kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes par byed pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504b-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos sngags thams cad kyi le'u gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504b-18: skyed mos tshal dang rnam par dben //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504b-19: chu klung rab tu 'bab pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504b-20: ri dang rnam par bkra ba ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504b-21: sgrub pa'i go 'phang gis bsgrub bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504b-23: gal te min na de 'grub min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504b-24: dben dang gzhan pa'i yul rnams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504b-25: sems ni gang du rab dgyes byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504b-26: gsang sngags 'bar bas byin brlabs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504b-28: rgya mtsho dang ni chu klung che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:504b-29: ri bo chen po'i rtse rnams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505a-2: nges par zla bas 'grub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505a-3: ske tshe dug dang yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505a-4: tig ta'i shing gi sbyin sreg gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505a-5: bsnyen pa sogs ni de bskyed nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505a-6: gsang sngags sgrub pa kun spyad bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505a-7: de la sdom pa bzung nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505a-8: nges par 'grub byed gzhan du min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505a-9: gsang sngags cho ga kun thob nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505a-10: sngags pas bsnyen pa 'grub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505a-11: de phyir sngags pas khyad par gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505a-12: sdom pa so sor bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505a-13: gang nyid sdom par yang dag brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505a-14: de nyid brtul zhugs can gyis bsrung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505a-15: gzhan du nam mkha' ji srid par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505a-16: mnar med dmyal bar kun du 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505a-17: ji srid 'tsho bar cho ga bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505a-18: slob dpon sdom pa srung ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505a-19: de yis sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505a-20: sna tshogs 'dzin pa kun gzhi yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505a-21: mnyam med gsang sngags bzlas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505a-22: sgrub pa'i bdag nyid can gyis bsgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505a-23: zla ba gcig gis 'jig rten gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505a-25: rnam shes las kyang byung ba'i sngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505a-26: 'bum phrag drug tu bzlas nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505a-27: rdo rje sems dpar phyag byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505a-29: sngags dang phyag rgya'i rab dbye bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505a-30: nges par sangs rgyas kyang thob byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505a-31: phyag rgya'i dbye bar bkod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505a-32: nges par lha rnams spyan drangs med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505a-33: ngag bdag gang nyid tshol byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505b-1: mkhas pas rab mchog sangs rgyas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505b-2: sogs pa'i phyag rgya bcing byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505b-3: de rnams sngags ni bzlas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505b-4: rtag tu nges par sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505b-5: sngags pas rgyal po'i bu mo gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505b-6: gal te sangs rgyas bu mo'ang rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505b-7: bzung nas nye bar longs spyad bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505b-8: ji srid yang ni tshim par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505b-9: dug dang ske tshe yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505b-10: yungs kar til mar bsres pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505b-11: rus pa rdo bar yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505b-12: ma tri tram de phye mar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505b-13: bshang dang gci ba rab bcug nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505b-14: brtul zhugs can gyi khyad par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505b-15: zur gsum mgrin pa'i me la bsreg nges par myur du 'grub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505b-16: lha sbyin zhes ni byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505b-17: gang gis 'di ni rab gsal byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505b-18: gal te 'dir ni sangs rgyas rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505b-19: gang de thal bar byed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505b-20: mkhas pas mtshan mo phyed la yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505b-21: nyi ma'i gung la sbyin sreg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505b-22: bskal pa gcig gi bar gyi yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505b-23: sbyin byed gzhan du nam yang min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505b-24: gal te sangs rgyas sam 'ga' zhig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505b-25: rmongs pa'i sems kyis 'das na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505b-26: mgo bo tshal ba bdun du 'gas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505b-27: byang chub sems ni ngang gis gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505b-28: rengs dang 'bebs pa dang por grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505b-29: gnyis pa sa zhes bya bar brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505b-30: gsum pa lha yi mchog yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505b-31: bzhi pa 'phags pa'i yul du yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505b-32: phyag na rdo rjer grags pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505b-33: snying po kun gyi sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:505b-34: bya ba myur du 'grub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506a-1: pa sna tshogs sogs dang gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506a-2: skyed mos tshal dang dga' ston che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506a-3: dkyil 'khor de la bya ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506a-4: bdug pa byin nas yang dag brtsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506a-5: gal te brgya byin nam tshangs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506a-6: sangs rgyas sam yang blo gros che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506a-7: cho ga shes pas zhag bdun gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506a-9: cho ga shes pas khrag gis byugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506a-10: rang nyid rang gi lus su bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506a-11: skra grol gtsug tor gyur nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506a-12: mi sdug mche gtsigs 'jigs par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506a-13: dur khrod khyim du yang dag sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506a-14: rang gis de yi ming bri bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506a-15: stong phrag gcig tu bzlas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506a-16: nges par sangs rgyas kyang 'dzin byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506a-17: cho ga shes pas gsher ba'i gos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506a-18: khro bo'i sems kyis rab zhugs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506a-19: ling ga rkang pas mnan nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506a-20: sangs rgyas kyang ni nges par 'joms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506a-21: khyab 'jug lha min la sogs lha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506a-22: rkang par byas nas brtsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506a-23: cho ga shes pas nyin bdun gyis; ;khams gsum po yang 'joms par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506a-24: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po sngags thams cad 'chang bas de skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506a-25: gsang ba chen po'i le'u bcu dgu pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos sgrub pa po thams cad kyi sdom pa'i le'u gsungs @506b so; ;bshang dang gci ba bza' bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506b-1: sems can kun la bde ba sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506b-2: rdo rje 'chang rgyal de nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506b-3: kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506b-4: rma dgu las ni yang dag byung /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506b-5: 'ga' zhig tu ni bza' bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506b-6: rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506b-7: kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506b-8: 'dod chags bza' bar bya ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506b-9: phan dang bde ba thams cad sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506b-10: de ni rdo rje 'chang rgyal po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506b-11: kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506b-12: zhe sdang bza' bar bya ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506b-13: rdo rje ye shes rab rtogs byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506b-14: de nyid rdo rje 'chang rgyal po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506b-15: kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506b-16: gti mug bza' bar bya ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506b-17: ye shes thams cad rtogs pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506b-18: de nyid zhi ba 'dzin rgyal po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506b-19: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad gzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506b-20: bde sdug bza' bar bya ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506b-21: slob dpon ji srid 'tsho yi bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506b-22: de nyid zhi ba 'dzin rgyal po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506b-23: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad gzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506b-24: slob dpon ji srid 'tsho yi bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506b-25: chos dang chos min bza' bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506b-26: de nyid rdo rje 'chang rgyal po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506b-27: kun mchog de nyid ston pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506b-29: sems can khams ni bza' bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506b-30: de nyid rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506b-31: kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506b-32: ji srid 'tsho bar snang ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506b-33: bya ba thams cad mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:506b-35: kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:507a-0: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad de @507a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:507a-1: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi chos nyid dang yi ge thos nas ngo mtshar thob nas rdo rje 'chang thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to; ;rigs kyi bu 'di ni ngo mtshar te gang du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bdag po de dag gi ming yang shes par bya ba ma yin na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:507a-2: gzhan lta ci smos zhes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:507a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i thugs kar gnas nas 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:507a-4: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i le'u bstan par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:507a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba; bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni g-yo bar byed pa zhes bya ba bstan du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:507a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnas sngar yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i sngags kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:507a-7: byin rlabs la sogs sngags sogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:507a-8: de nyid sna tshogs rnam bsgom pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:507a-9: cho ga shes pas de steng du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:507a-10: yi ge bzhi ni rnam bsgom pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:507a-11: bdag nyid dbus su son byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:507a-12: rang gi gzugs su gzugs mtshon pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:507b-0: @507b rang sems byang chub yang dag 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:507b-1: cho ga shes pas kun dgang bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:507b-3: sgom pa 'di nyid rab sgrub byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:507b-4: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:507b-5: shel dang zla ba mtshungs pa'i 'od //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:507b-6: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:507b-7: bzhi lnga'i yi ge rnam bsgoms nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:507b-8: yi ge lnga ni rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:507b-9: sngags pas lus kyi dbus son par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:507b-10: aom yig ser po dang mtshungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:507b-12: der son bdag nyid sngags pas sgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:507b-13: dbus su h'um yig yang dag sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:507b-14: rang gzugs dge ba bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:507b-16: gzugs brnyan tshul gyis bskyed nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:507b-17: mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:507b-18: yid du 'ong ba bsgom par gyis; ;sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan de rnams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:507b-19: 'od zer lnga ni rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:507b-20: rnam snang mdzad gzugs 'od zer gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:507b-21: nam mkha'i khams ni kun bkang bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:507b-22: brtsams nas cho ga shes pas der //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:507b-23: bsdus nas de la ltung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:507b-24: zla ba 'char bas mtshan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:507b-25: mnyam med gzugs ni bskyed nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:507b-26: gsal ba'i ral pa 'chang zhi ba; ;cod pan lnga ni 'dzin pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:507b-28: sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam bsgoms nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:507b-29: dkyil 'khor du bzhugs bsams nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508a-2: sangs rgyas gzugs ni de rnams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508a-3: rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgoms pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508a-4: gtsug tor de yi bzlas pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508a-5: khro bo gang gzhan 'byung bas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508a-6: rigs rnams thams cad nyid kyi yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508a-7: bskyed pa'i cho gar 'gyur ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508a-8: rdo rje gsum kun du 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje 'chang chen po rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508a-10: cho ga shes pas de thams cad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508a-11: aom yig dbus su rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508a-12: 'bar ba'i phreng bas rnam brgyan pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508a-13: h'um yig mthar ni rnam bsgoms nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508a-14: dbus su rdo rje 'chang bsams nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508a-16: zhi ba ral pa'i cod pan 'chang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508a-17: phyag na rdo rje rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508a-18: rnam par snang mdzad rnam bsgoms nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508a-20: bsams nas de yi thugs ka ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508a-21: zla bar sngags kyi yi ge bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508a-22: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508a-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508a-24: de bzhin nyid du kun byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508a-25: dbus su ham yig sgom pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508b-0: @508b ngos su rang gi gzugs ltar byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508b-1: rdo rje dmar po rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508b-2: dbus su chos 'chad bsams nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508b-3: padma r'a ga'i dbang mtshungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508b-5: de yi dbus su rnam bsgom pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508b-6: thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508b-7: bsams nas sngags ni rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508b-8: bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin gyi cho ga rdzogs so;; ;;cho ga shes pas gzugs byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508b-9: ngos su ham yig yang dag sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508b-10: dbus su rang gi rnam pa bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508b-12: 'dod mchod gzugs ni bskyed par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508b-13: lag tu mdud rtse gsum bsgoms nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508b-14: de yi snying gar dkyil 'khor dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508b-15: chos kyi dbang phyug gzugs bsgoms nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508b-16: phyi nas bya pa yang dag brtsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508b-17: sgron ma 'byung ba zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa'i mchod pa'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508b-18: yang na brtul zhugs can gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508b-19: bsdu bas sangs rgyas gzugs bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508b-20: gtsug tor sngags dang khro bo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508b-21: rig pa'i rgyal po rigs bcas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508b-22: las rnams thams cad pa yi sngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508b-23: go rims bzhin du de bzlas bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508b-24: dbus su bdag po bsgoms nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508b-25: ngos su lha rnams dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508b-26: snying po sbyor ba de rnams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:508b-27: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509a-2: de yis lha rnams rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509a-3: thams cad kyi ni lag par ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509a-5: mdung dang yid bzhin nor bu yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509a-6: bsgoms nas myur du sgrub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509a-7: sngags pas rang sngags bzlas bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509a-8: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509a-9: ngos su zla ba yang dag sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509a-10: dbus su ser po rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509a-11: bsdus te gong bu'i tshul gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509a-12: rang gi lus la dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509a-13: sangs rgyas thams cad rab bskul bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509a-14: 'di ni rengs par byed pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509a-15: dus rnams kun du rnams bsgoms nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509a-16: nges par bskal par de gnas 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509a-17: cho ga shes pas mi bskyod sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509a-18: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la dgod bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509a-19: rigs kyi dbang phyug rnam bsgoms nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509a-20: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dgong pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509a-21: thog ma tha mar bsam gtan 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509a-22: bzhi yi dbus su bsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509a-23: de yis sangs rgyas nyid bsgrubs na; ;yun mi ring bar sangs rgyas 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509a-24: de yi rang gi sngags kyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509a-25: phyag rgya shes nas sgrub pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509a-26: cho ga shes pas bskyed par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509a-27: myur du 'grub byed gzhan du min /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509a-28: phyag rgya chen por rab bsgoms nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509a-29: nam mkha'i lam gyi dbus las ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509a-30: dbus su nyi ma dang mtshungs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509a-31: dkyil 'khor dge ba bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509b-0: sngags pas dkyil @509b 'khor las ngos su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509b-1: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509b-2: bdag po'i gzugs ni yang dag bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509b-3: de yis mi g-yo bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509b-4: rin chen bzhi byung sgo nga ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509b-5: sbrang rtsi mar gyis rab tu dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509b-6: sngags kyi yi ge rnam bsgoms nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509b-7: bsam pa de yis sbyin sreg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509b-8: dkyil 'khor lnga yi tshul gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509b-9: dbus su h'um gi yi ge 'gengs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509b-11: kun nas rnam par 'phro bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509b-12: de la gnas pas lha yi gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509b-13: tshim pa'i dam tshig gsum 'byung bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509b-14: cho ga shes pas gtsug tor gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509b-15: gtsug tor rnams ni bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509b-16: bdag po'i sngags ni yang dag bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509b-17: mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509b-18: kun nas sor mo bcu gnyis pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509b-20: chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509b-21: de nyid kyis ni bsgom par bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509b-22: rtse mo lnga pa'i rdo rje che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509b-24: a'a li bcu drug yang dag ldan; ;rtag tu bsgom bya 'grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509b-25: sngags pas sor mo nyi shu pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509b-26: rtse gsum ser po dang mtshungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509b-27: cho ga nyid kyis bsgoms byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509b-29: padma las kyi rdo rje dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509b-30: yid bzhin nor bu gsum pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509b-31: bdag po'i sngags ni yang dag bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:509b-32: myur du sgrub byed gzhan du min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510a-2: bsams nas rdo rje'i cho ga las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510a-3: sgom pa'i go 'phang gis bsgrub bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510a-5: rdo rje chen po mdung sogs bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510a-7: kun gyi las can gsang sngags kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510a-8: rjod pa rnams kyis brjod byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510a-11: khru gang tsam du yang dag bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510a-12: khro bar byed pa'i khyad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510a-13: pho nya mngag gzhug sogs sngags rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510a-15: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sbyor ba las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510a-16: sgom pas mchog tu mthong bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510a-17: dbyug pa thob dgra sta dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510a-18: zhags pa patti sa sgom pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510a-19: cho gas bsgom par byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510a-20: rdo rje 'chang rnams mnyes par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510a-21: 'di de sngags rnams thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510a-22: sku gsung thugs kyi sgom pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510a-23: rdo rje ye shes can gyis gsang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510a-24: ye shes dngos grub can du brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510a-25: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas de skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510a-26: gang zhig dngos grub mchog 'dod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510a-27: cho ga shes pas sbyin sreg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510a-28: de nyid gsang ba'i ting 'dzin gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510a-29: rnam pa sna tshogs sbyin sreg brtsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510a-30: dkyil 'khor bzhi yi sbyor ba las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510a-31: rigs kyi las ni sgrub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510b-0: @510b aom yig sngags kyi dbye ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510b-1: sgom pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510b-2: zhi ba can la dkyil 'khor zlum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510b-3: rgyas pa can la zur bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510b-4: mngon spyod la ni gru gsum mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510b-5: dbang bya gzhu yi rnam pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510b-6: zhi la me yi dbus so na par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510b-7: bdud rtsi lta bur bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510b-8: de nyid la ni lha yi gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510b-9: rang gi tshul gyis bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510b-10: bdag nyid bdag po'i tshul gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510b-11: 'di ni rdo rje'i tshul las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510b-12: kha ni rab tu gdangs byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510b-14: sngags pas lce yi dbus son par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510b-15: h'um yig de yis bsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510b-16: bcom ldan 'das sbyin sreg rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510b-17: cho ga shes pas 'o ma sbrang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510b-18: mar ni zhi ba'i rigs la spyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510b-19: mar khu chen po'i bye brag las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510b-20: ye shes rdo rje'i rigs su brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510b-21: zhi la rdo rje slob dpon gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510b-22: snying ga'i dbus son rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510b-23: yid bzhin nor bu lag bsams nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510b-24: 'di ni dag pa'i tshul mchog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510b-25: rnam par snang mdzad gzugs brnyan che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510b-27: gzugs ni 'dod chags rigs mchog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510b-28: gzugs ni 'dod mchod rdo rje can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510b-29: las bzhi'i rab tu dbye ba las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510b-30: sngags kyi yi ge dgod byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:510b-31: bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i sbyin sreg rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511a-0: gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por de @511a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511a-1: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags yid bzhin nor bu'i le'u ste nyi shu pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs kyi sngags kun las btus pa zhes bya ba'i snying po'i le'u 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511a-3: sangs rgyas rdo rje chos chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511a-4: 'dod pa'i dam tshig dgyes pa po; ;sngags rnams thams cad yang dag dmigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511a-5: de yi bsam gtan rab bskul bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511a-6: dam tshig ye shes sangs rgyas kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511a-7: rigs dmigs dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511a-8: gzugs ni sangs rgyas mtshungs pa'i 'od //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511a-9: aom yig ye shes dbye ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511a-10: 'di ni rdo rje'i tshul bstan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511a-11: ral ba'i cod pan longs spyod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511a-12: kha dog dkar po shin tu mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511a-13: phyag bzhi pa la spyan yangs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511a-15: rnal 'byor mchod phyir thogs la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511a-16: brgyan cing dkyil 'khor la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511a-17: cod pan du ni rdo rje sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511a-18: mdzes pa'i gzugs ni rgyal ba'i gzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511a-19: dbang po gnyis kyi rab sbyor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511a-20: 'di ni bsam gtan tshul mchog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511a-21: sku yi rdo rje'i sogs sbyor gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511a-22: mngon shes lnga yi rab sbyor las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511a-23: rkang gnyis mchog de nyid shes pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511a-24: thod pa can gyi gtso bor brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511a-25: sangs rgyas kun gyi 'di ye shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511a-26: rigs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje @511b rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid byin gyis rlob ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511b-1: rdo rje thams cad kyi dam tshig gi snying po 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511b-2: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511b-3: dbus su gzugs ni rab brtag bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511b-4: nag po shin tu rnam 'gyur khros //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511b-5: ma rungs zhal ni rnam par gdangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511b-6: me stag 'bibs po 'bar ba sti; ;'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511b-7: phyag bzhi pa ste rab 'bad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511b-8: dbang po gnyis kyis rab sbyor las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511b-9: 'di ni rdo rje'i tshul bstan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511b-10: rdo rje thugs sogs yang dag grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511b-11: rab tu gnas pas de bsgrub bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511b-12: 'dod chags rdo rje rab bskul bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511b-13: dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511b-14: rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje chos thams cad 'chang ba'i dam tshig byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511b-16: chos 'chang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511b-17: chos kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba las; ;dbus su gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511b-19: sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511b-20: phyag bzhi pa la yid 'ong bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511b-21: dbang po gnyis kyi rab sbyor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511b-22: de yi cho ga bsgom pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511b-24: gsung gi rdo rje gtso dngos grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511b-25: rdo rje chos rab sbyor sogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:511b-26: snying rje'i bdag nyid can gyis sgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512a-2: chos 'chang ba'i dam tshig gi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje dam tshig gi rdo rje'i rigs byin gyi rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512a-4: rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512a-5: 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor bsam gtan gyis gzugs ni dbus su dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512a-6: khyab bdag zhi ba ser po'i mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512a-7: spyan gsum brtul zhugs can gyis bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512a-8: kun du dag pa'i shel dang mtshungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512a-9: me stag tshogs ni kun du 'khrugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512a-10: phyag bzhi par ni cho ga yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512a-11: bsgom bya myur du 'grub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512a-12: rdo rje'i mthar thug nor dngos grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512a-13: rab tu gnas pas de bsgrub bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512a-14: 'di de sngags rnams thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512a-15: thar pa'i ting 'dzin snying po can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512a-16: sku gsung thugs kyi sgom pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512a-17: rdo rje sems dpas sprul pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512a-18: rdo rje mdung gi dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512a-19: ji srid gzugs ni kun sbyor ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512a-20: de la lha nyid rab tu grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512a-21: slar yang 'di yi tshul gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512a-22: skyed par byed pa'i cho gar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512a-23: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas de skad ces gsungs so; ;rang gi sngags yig dbye bas sam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512a-24: yang na rigs kyi rig pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512a-25: rigs kyi bdag po'i sngags kyis sam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512a-26: brtul zhugs can gyi rig rgyal pos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512b-0: thams cad las can @512b sngags kyis dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512b-1: gtsug tor sngags kyis rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512b-2: 'di de sngags rnams thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512b-3: gsang ba'i de nyid gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512b-4: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512b-5: zhi ba'i las kyi rab dbye bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512b-6: rigs kyi sngags su rab tu grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512b-7: rgyas pa can la rigs kyi sngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512b-8: sgom pas nges par 'grub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512b-9: dbang du bya ba'i cho ga las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512b-10: rig pa'i rgyal pos bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512b-11: thams cad las can sngags kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512b-12: mngon spyod rnam par sgom par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512b-13: skrod par byed pa'i cho ga las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512b-14: gtsug tor du ni rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512b-15: sngags shes pas ni phur gdab sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512b-16: pho nya pho nya mo bsam bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512b-17: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512b-18: 'od zer lnga yi tshul gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512b-19: rtog pas de la bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512b-20: gzhan du dngos grub med pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512b-21: sgom pa rnams su shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512b-22: rigs kyi las kyi rab dbye bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512b-23: dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rnam sgom pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512b-24: sngags kyi yi ge'i rab dbye bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512b-25: bsgom bya dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512b-26: snying ga'i dbus son phra mo ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512b-27: dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rnam bsgom pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512b-28: sngags kyi yi ge'i rab dbye bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512b-29: bsgoms pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512b-30: snying ga'i dbus son phra mo ni; ;dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rnam bsgom pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512b-31: steng du bkod pa'i dbye ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512b-32: 'di ni bsam gtan tshul mchog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:512b-33: dkar nag dmar po'i sbyor ba las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513a-2: gzhan du dngos grub med pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513a-3: sngags rnams kun du bzlas par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513a-4: h'um yig aom yig dbye ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513a-5: sv'a h'a h'um yig gzhan gyi gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513a-6: skyed pa'i cho ga byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513a-7: bsnyen pa gang zhig nges bsgrub bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513a-8: rigs gsum la yang h'um yig dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513a-9: aom yig ye shes rigs mchog yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513a-10: sngags kyi yi ge la sogs rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513a-11: dpral bar bkod nas rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513a-12: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis de skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513a-13: thun bzhi'i sbyor ba la sogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513a-14: rdo rje can la bdud rtsi'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513a-15: spro ba dang ni gnas par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513a-16: 'di ni dngos grub tshul bstan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513a-17: sgrub par rang gi lha yi gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513a-18: rdo rje can la bdud rtsi'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513a-19: nye bar sgrub pa 'dus pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513a-20: 'di ni dngos grub tshul mchog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513a-21: bdag gi sgrub pa'i las can la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513a-22: bdag po'i gzugs dang yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513a-23: bsnyen pa'i dus su rab bsgrub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513a-24: gtsug tor gzugs dang yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513a-26: rang lha'i gzugs dang yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513a-27: rdo rje phra rab dbye ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513a-28: dus gsum sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513a-29: grags par ldan pa'i dngos grub kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513a-30: 'di nyid kyis ni byang chub thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513a-31: de yi mchog tu bsgrub bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513a-32: dngos grub chen po'i yon tan 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513a-33: bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513b-0: gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par @513b rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por sngags thams cad kun las btus pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig ba rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus par gyur nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i bkod pas yang dag par mchod nas gsung gi rdo rje chos kyi gsung gi lam nges par bskyed pa'i rdo rje'i tshul 'di ston par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513b-2: gsang ba dag pa dmigs pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513b-3: ye shes yon tan kun gyi gzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513b-4: kun nas ye shes bdag med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513b-5: gsang ba'i ye shes phyag 'tshal bstod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513b-6: gsang ba'i de nyid don dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513b-7: mchog gi spyod pa rgya mtsho che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513b-9: rdo rje ye shes phyag 'tshal bstod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513b-10: gtso bo'i ye shes ji ltar gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513b-11: rdo rje mi phyed gsum gnas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513b-12: rigs kyi pha rol phyin pa thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513b-13: byang chub spyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513b-14: sems can kun skyes can gyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513b-15: sangs rgyas byang chub rab gzhug mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513b-16: rang bzhin dag pa dag pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513b-17: sems can skyob la phyag 'tshal bstod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513b-18: chos sku thar pa chen po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513b-19: yid bzhin nor bu mthong ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513b-20: sems can kun dgyes byed pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513b-21: dag pa'i spyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:513b-22: de nas yang yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:514a-1: byang chub sems dpa' de'i mthong ba'i chos kyi yon tan gyi khyad par so sor 'dod par bya ba gang ci ltar lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:514a-2: de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:514a-3: the tshom med par mnyam par shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:514a-4: sangs rgyas chos su 'dod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:514a-5: the tshom med par 'du shes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:514a-6: chos rnams thams cad 'dod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:514a-7: the tshom med par 'du shes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:514a-10: rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sprin gyi sa la rab tu gnas pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:514a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:514a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:514a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sku rnams su rnam par rtog pa med cing the tshom med pa de bdag go zhes chos thams cad kyang nam mkhar mthong bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:514a-14: rigs kyi bu mdor bsdus na byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje ye shes zhes brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:514b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skyes bu'i mchog la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces @514b gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:514b-1: bcom ldan 'das sngags kyi spyad pa spyod par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di don dam pa'i gsang ba la dad par ci ltar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:514b-3: yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su yang dag par byang chub nas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ji ltar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:514b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:514b-5: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gcig pu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:514b-6: rdo rje 'chang bas gsol ba ji ltar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:514b-7: 'di lta ste gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra rab kyi cha shas su gyur pa gzhi'i sems can rnams mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:514b-8: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyag na rdo rje'i tshul 'di blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:514b-9: de nas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la mtshan thob cing dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba thob nas de lta bu'i dbyangs 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:514b-10: ae ma'o ye shes ye shes che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:514b-11: rdo rje chen po rab tu mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:514b-12: rmad du byung ba'i 'jig rten gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:514b-13: ye shes mig ni rnam sbyangs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:515a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin @515a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:515a-1: gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:515a-2: snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong byung nas shar dang lho la sogs pa'i phyogs mngon par brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i sku gsum gyi ye shes kyi gang bar mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:515a-3: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams byon nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:515a-4: byang chub rang bzhin yang dag thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:515a-5: byang chub sems dpas snying po byin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:515a-6: nam mkha'i khams la longs spyod pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:515a-7: rdo rje byang chub rab tu gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:515a-8: mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:515a-9: spros pa dag ni yod ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:515a-10: rdo rje'i rang bzhin ye shes kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:515a-11: nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:515a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas rdo rje chos la bos par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:515a-14: sems dpa' chen po dam tshig gang yin pa de mthong ngam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:515b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje skyes bu chen po de'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dbye ba rin po che sgrom bu nges par rig @515b nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams rang gi thugs su zhugs par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:515b-1: de ji lta ba bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs nam mkha' lta bur sbyor bas yang dag par gnas par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:515b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs yongs su dag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:515b-3: 'phags pa gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:515b-4: mkhan chen thar pa lo ts'a ba'i phyag dpe'i gseb nas shog yar lnga byung ba sngar bsgyur ba las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:515b-5: phyis nyang stod smon 'gro'i gtsug lag khang nas rgya dpe lhag ma rnams rnyed nas bsgyur bar rtsom pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:515b-6: dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i phyi nang gzhan gsum gyi tshul la mi 'jigs pa'i spobs pa thob pa'i bla ma yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyi brda sprod pa'i tshul la blo gros shin tu byang ba'i 'jig rten gyi mig chos grags dpal bzang po'i bkas bskul zhing sbyin bdag mdzad nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:515b-7: bu ston gyis bsgyur ba'i yi ge pa ni dge slong rin chen rgyal mtshan pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:515b-8: rgyud min rgyud ltar bcos pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:516a-0: chos min sun dbyung bya phyir @516a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:516a-2: dam chos snang ba spel ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:516a-3: ji ltar nus bzhin bsgyur ba lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:516a-5: rgya dpe'i dpe dbang ma rnyed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:516a-6: don zab sgra ni rtogs dka' la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:516a-7: sam skri ta la ma byang bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:516a-8: sgra don ji bzhin ma 'byor ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:516a-9: nongs de mkhas rnams bzod mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:516a-10: phyis 'byung skad gnyis smra rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:516a-11: mdag shes na bcos par zhu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:516a-12: rgyud chen 'di ni bsgyur ba las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:516a-13: dge ba bdag gis gang thob pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:516a-14: de yis mtha' yas 'gro ba kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:516a-15: rdo rje 'chang chen nyid gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:516a-17: // 'di dang thun mong ma yin pa'i gsang ba gcig tu 'dod pa yang dag par 'khrul bar snang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:516a-18: rgya dpe zubs pa'i bar skabs nas mtshang ba rnams su dkyus mchan re bkod yod pas shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:516a-20: mkhas grub thams cad mkhyen pas sdom gsum bslab bya thub bstan byi dor du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:516a-21: des na gsang 'dus gnyis med rnam rgyal gyi rgyud yang dag par rdzogs pa bod dum 'gyur kyang thar lo nyi ma rgyal mtshan gyi phyag dpe'i nang nas rgya dpe shog yar 'ga' zhig rnyed pa la brten nas bu ston thams cad mkhyen pas bsgyur pa le'u dang po'i mgo nas cung zad tsam mtshang ba'i le'u bzhi ba'i mgo yan chad dang le'u tha ma'i mjug cung zad gcig yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:516a-22: rgyud yang dag 'di la le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis las med kyang sngar bod na yongs su grags pa'i gsang 'dus gnyis med rnam rgyal kyi rgyud le'u bdun cu don bdun yod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:516b-0: de'i rjes su 'brangs nas gsang 'dus mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la bskal bzang stong du bzhis mtshang ba bkod pa'i @516b dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang dbang bskur dang rdzogs rim kyi rnam gzhag sogs thams cad rdzun ma yin par shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:516b-1: bu ston thams cad mkhyen pas kyang khong rang gi de'i 'gyur byang du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:516b-2: 'di la dum bu las med kyang sngar gyi gnyis med rnam rgyal gyi rgyud du 'dod pa le'u bdun cu don bdun yod pa de rdzun ma yang dag par rtogs pa'i dgos pa yod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:516b-3: des na de dang de la brten pa'i dbang bka' thams cad rdzun ma yin pas rtogs ldan rnams kyis spang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:516b-5: da dung 'ga' zhig de'i cho ga dang dbang bskur byed pa snang ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:516b-6: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la gnod pa bya ba'i phyir du blun po nan gyis 'tshang bar byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:516b-7: zhes gsungs pa ltar gnyis med rnam rgyal gyi rgyud che bar grags pa le'u don bdun yod pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston rin po che dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:516b-8: mkhas grub rin po che rnams gnyis kyis rgyud rdzun ma yin par gsungs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:516b-9: kun gzigs lnga pa chen po'i gsan yig gang+g'a'i chu rgyun du'ang de dang mthun par gsungs pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:516b-10: mkhas pa mang du thos pa'i spyan dang ldan pa rnams kyis rgyud rdzun ma nyid du gsungs pa bzhin 'dir yang ma bcug la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:516b-11: gnyis med rnam rgyal kyi rgyud le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa 'di ni rgyud yang dag pa nyid du bzhed cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:516b-12: bu ston thams cad mkhyen pas bsgyur bar le'u dang po'i dbu nas cung zad tsams 'gyur ba sde dge'i bar du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:516b-15: dbu nas mtshang ba rnyed na bsgyur bar bya'o /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:516b-17: dus byis jing gir rigs kyi skad rigs smra ba'i lo ts'a ba mgon po skyabs kyis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:516b-18: rgya nag gong ma'i bka' bstan rin po che'i zhus dag byas pa'i [?] rnyed pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:516b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen por snang ba de dpag tshad stong phrag ces pa yan chad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:516b-20: bod skad du bsgyur nas spyir bod kyi bka' 'gyur ro 'tshal thams cad dang bye brag tu sde dge'i par la 'jug rgyur stsal ba'i tshe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:516b-22: de ltar bu ston rin po ches bsab dgos par bka' chems su bzhag pa nas bzung ste lo lnga brgyar nye ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:517a-0: chen po ching gur gyi gnam sa'i dbang phyug rabs drug pa bdag nyid chen po gong ma lha skyong rgyal po'i gnam lo @517a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:517a-2: jing gir rigs las bka' 'gyur khang gi do dam pa bod kyi slob grva'i ming bzang mgon po skyabs kyis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:517a-3: rgya'i bka' 'gyur nang gi rgya gar pan chen d'a na rakshi tas bsgyur ba'i rgyud dpe tshang ma las blangs te ji nus bzhin bod skad du bsgyur nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:517a-4: thams cad mkhyen pa badzra dha ra ta la'i bla ma'i sku zhabs dang kvan ting kvan shin lcang skya'i zhal snga la sogs pa'i bla chen mang por gzigs su phul bar /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:517a-5: tshang mas dgyes pa chen pos legs so gnang ba la brten nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:517a-6: slar gnam lo gnyis pa'i zla 12 tshes 15 bzang po'i nyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:517a-7: dad stobs kyis mngon par 'phags pa ho shos thob chin dbang dang ho shos h'a lya kha chin dbang gnyis brgyud de gong du zhus pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:517a-8: gong nas kyang legs so stsal bgus pas dang du blangs te bod kyi bka' 'gyur nang kha skongs su tshud par byas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:517a-9: zhes pa'i khungs bkod nas kha bskangs 'dug pa ltar 'dir yang brkos shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:517a-10: yang sde dge bar ma'i bu ston rin po che'i 'gyur byang du mkhan chen thar pa lo ts'a ba'i phyag dpe'i gseb nas rgya dpe shog yar 'ga' shas rnyed pa bsgyur ba las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:517a-11: phyis nyang stod smon 'gro'i gtsug lag khang nas rgya dpe lhag ma rnams rnyed de bsgyur bar zhes sogs 'gyur byang dang bcas lhag mtshang bar 'dug pa ltar 'dir yang sde bar sor gzhag gis brkos yod kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:517a-12: mkhas grub rin po che'i gsung gong du drangs pa ltar bu ston thams cad mkhyen pas bsgyur ba le'u dang po'i dbu nas cung zad tsam mtshang ba'i le'u bzhi pa'i mgo yan chad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:517a-13: le'u tha ma'i mjug cung zad cig yod de zhes dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:517a-14: bu ston rang gi 'gyur byang drangs par yang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:517a-15: 'di la dum bu las med kyang zhes sogs gsungs pa ltar na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:517a-16: bar rnams bu ston rin po ches bsgyur bar ma mdzad pa lta bu zhig gsungs pa bcas 'gyur byang gnyis kyang mi mthun pas zhib tu dpyad dgos par snang yod /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-079:517a-17: dpe dbang gzhan ma rnyed pas slad mkhas pa rnams kyis dpyad par mdzod cig /)/
